languages.text: "Доводы приняты и будут взвешены на весах правосудия! Сторона удалится в капеллу долготерпения в ожидании вердикта".
"The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
languages.original_text: "Доводы приняты и будут взвешены на весах правосудия! Сторона удалится в капеллу долготерпения в ожидании вердикта".

traits.locale_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and will be weighed on the scales of justice! The plaintiff's side will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
"The arguments are acknowledged and will be weighed on the scales of justice! The plaintiff's side will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
"The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The plaintiff's side will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
"The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The plaintiff's side will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
"The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."
"The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

languages.text: "Die Argumente wurden zur Kenntnis genommen und werden in den Schalen der Justiz abgewogen! Der Vertreter wird sich in die Kapelle der Geduld zurückziehen, um auf den Urteilsspruch zu warten."
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: "Die Argumente wurden zur Kenntnis genommen und werden in den Schalen der Justiz abgewogen! Der Vertreter wird sich in die Kapelle der Geduld zurückziehen, um auf den Urteilsspruch zu warten."

languages.text: « Les arguments ont été pris en considération et seront pesés sur la Balance de la Justice ! La représentante va maintenant se retirer dans la Chapelle de la Patience en attendant le verdict. »
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: « Les arguments ont été pris en considération et seront pesés sur la Balance de la Justice ! La représentante va maintenant se retirer dans la Chapelle de la Patience en attendant le verdict. »

languages.text: “上述主张已得到认可，将会放在正义天平上进行衡量。相关代表请回到恒毅教堂，等待判决结果。”
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: “上述主张已得到认可，将会放在正义天平上进行衡量。相关代表请回到恒毅教堂，等待判决结果。”

languages.text: «¡Los argumentos quedan reconocidos y se sopesarán en la Balanza de la Justicia! El representante debe retirarse a la Capilla de la Paciencia a esperar el veredicto».
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: «¡Los argumentos quedan reconocidos y se sopesarán en la Balanza de la Justicia! El representante debe retirarse a la Capilla de la Paciencia a esperar el veredicto».

languages.text: 「議論は認められ、正義の天秤にかけられる！代表者は忍耐の礼拝堂に退き、判決を待つように」
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: 「議論は認められ、正義の天秤にかけられる！代表者は忍耐の礼拝堂に退き、判決を待つように」

languages.text: "İddialar görülmüş olup Adalet Terazisi'nde tartılacaktır! Vekil, hükmü beklemek üzere Sabır Şapeli'ne çekilecektir."
languages.original_text: "The arguments are acknowledged and shall be weighed on the Scales of Justice! The representative will retreat to the Chapel of Patience to await the verdict."

traits.locale_text: "İddialar görülmüş ve Adalet Terazisi'nde tartılacaktır! Vekil, hükmü beklemek üzere Sabır Şapeli'ne çekilecektir."
